Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Graduate Electrical and Computer Engineering Curriculum - UT Austin

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value:
"Degrees Offered: Master of Science in Engineering and Doctor of Philosophy
Academic Tracks: Graduate courses are offered with varying degrees of specialization in the following general areas. Topics of specialization within each track reflect currently active research areas of the faculty. Biomedical Engineering Circuit Design Communications, Networks and Systems (CommNetS) Computer Engineering Electromagnetics and Acoustics Energy Systems Manufacturing Systems Engineering Plasma and Quantum Electronics and Optics Solid State Electronics
Each track allows the design of a program of study to match the educational and research objectives of each student. "
